welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kaizuka, Japan, a city known for its rich history, beautiful cherry blossoms, and delicious local cuisine. We hope you enjoy your time here and take the opportunity to explore all the charm this city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kansai International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Kansai International Airport, primarily serving low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free Wi-Fi network by selecting it and agreeing to the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kobe Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Kobe Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Itami Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Itami Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with no time limit.
